item.description:
Our BBB member Dave S wanted to send this along:

Hi fans of live music! Johnny D's in Davis Sq. Somerville has been a hotbed of great music for decades and so has Boston's own Barrence Whitfield. A soul singer of international acclaim- Barrence will rock the house on Fri. April 5 so let's join in the fun! We'll meet at 6:00 for drinks and sit for dinner at 6:30. Show is only $12 and starts at 7:30. You need to spend $12 on dinner to get the reserved seat Let me know by March 18. See you then!

Dave will be making the reservations - just click yes on the rsvp and we can get the count to Dave and secure our very own space for us Baby Boomers!

Â

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Johnny D's in Davis Sq. Somerville -Boston's Barrence Whitfield!
